about_the_game:
A long time ago to control rising crime rates the rulers of the land enacted new laws, prolific criminals would have the right to earn off their bounty working for the "Company" or face immediate execution.

In the new world these laws created, most criminals carefully managed the bounty they had accumulated in order to fall within a grey area. Too low of a bounty to warrant hunters coming after you, while not high enough to face the threat of immediate execution.

You however are not so lucky, as your bounty just reached the threshold and now, you're a high value target!

Work within the rules of the Company to earn your ticket to Paradise, clear your family name, solve the murder of your father and correct the two-tiered system the Bounty Laws created.

Play the game the way you want, complete tasks for NPCs and/or the Company, or lower your bounty simply by taking care of monsters.

Protect the people of Frontiersville from all that would do them harm. Become the law, or break the law.

Banished Stone is a CASUAL SINGLEPLAYER ACTION RPG. Play for as little or as long as you want as you work to get your bounty to 0 and earn your ticket. Over 10 hours of content.

GAME FEATURES

  • THE RIDGE - The game takes place in a hard to reach valley known locally as the Ridge. You'll be free to explore the Ridge, Frontiersville and other areas simply by walking around or flying.
  • BOUNTY - Performing tasks and/or slaying monsters will lower your bounty, certain other tasks may increase your bounty. The goal is to get your bounty to zero and earn your ticket to Paradise.
  • PARADISE - A mythical place where all your dreams come true. For criminals that have earned a ticket by getting their bounty to zero. No one has ever returned from Paradise.
  • FLYING - Known as the Wings of Wisdom, this relic has been in your family for generations. Upon your fathers death the wings were protected and kept for you. With the wings in your possession you're able to fly to access additional content and to get around obstacles. Unlimited flying in safe zones likes Frontiersville, while flying in other regions drains energy.
  • LIGHT AND DARK - Passive loot drop items known as Illumination and Darkness can be used to alter the Time of Day in an area to change the lighting from day to night or night to day. Additional content may be available in one area when the Time of Day changes, monsters may behave differently at night or during the day.
  • ITEMS AND LOOT - Kill monsters to gain loot, buy items from NPCs, earn pet rewards or complete tasks to obtain items!
  • MONSTERS - You'll encounter a whole array of monsters, varied spawning systems and of course mean looking bosses. Each of these will come with it's own set of challenges and varying amounts of bounty to earn.
  • PETS - Uncover all of the animals in the Ridge that just need a little help from a friend. Use pet food to make them fall in love with you, then use a pet collar to make them yours forever!!! Or until you find a cuter, more cuddlier pet. Pets are for vanity purposes only. Although feeding a loveless animal in the wild may also yield a special reward.
  • REALTIME COMBAT - Combat happens in real time. Use your combat abilities, and found powers to fight your enemies and/or bring a combat pet in to help.
  • CUSTOMIZE - Choose your preferred gender, hair color, skin tone and eye color from a varied array of over 100 options.

short_description: A casual fantasy action RPG. Wanted for a number of crimes your bounty has reached a level that can no longer be ignored. Work with the Company to earn your freedom and a one way pass to Paradise. Solve your fathers murder, collect bounties, solve quests, tame pets and learn to use your wings.
